resources.string: - Line Tool, draws a straight line from one point to another
- Brush Tool, free form painting in any direction or path
- Rectangle Tool, draw a rectangle of any size
- Rounded Rectangle Tool, draw a rectangle of any size with rounded corners
- Circle Tool, draw a circle of any size
- New Doodle, scratch what you have drawn and start completely over
- Save, save your drawing as an image to your gallery
